verbs.description: at 5 - 1 no 9 texas [V: going] [ARG1: all] [ARGM-DIR: in] [ARGM-PRD: on tom herman game by game win by win texas] is going all in on tom herman just check his phone in the 24 hours after his longhorns beat oklahoma 48 - 45 to rise to no 9 in the top 25 rankings his phone lit up with nearly 200 text messages of congratulations herman remembers how many he got after a season - opening loss to maryland tom herman longhorns oklahoma notre dame texas
